plot: When three girls, two thieves, and a demigod with a drinking problem cross paths one night, they discover that there's a little evil inside all of us.
title: Better the Devil
plot_es: When three girls, two thieves, and a demigod with a drinking problem cross paths one night, they discover that there's a little evil inside all of us.
plot_en: When three girls, two thieves, and a demigod with a drinking problem cross paths one night, they discover that there's a little evil inside all of us.
